description: Successfully upgraded an existing .NET Framework web application to .NET 8, improving performance and maintainability.
Reduced deployment time by 40% and enhanced system efficiency by 30% through modernization efforts.
Migrated a .NET Framework API application to .NET Core 8, enhancing performance and scalability.
Improved API response time by 40% through optimized integration with ElasticSearch.
Designed and implemented a serverless architecture using AWS Lambda, SQS, and S3 to efficiently process and store data, improving scalability and cost-effectiveness.
Managed and optimized SQL databases using Microsoft SQL Server (SSMS), writing complex queries, stored procedures, and performing performance tuning for efficient data processing.
experience.title: Software Engineer
